title: BETA Fallout Anomaly
description: "Fallout: Anomaly" is the culmination of a bold vision that brings together some of the most renowned mod lists in the Fallout 4 community. Our team has meticulously combined the best elements from "A Storywealth" for its rich content, "Immersive Wasteland" for its survival challenges and zombie-like threats, "Vault Boy 101 Total Overhaul v.2.0" for its modern gameplay enhancements, and "Lost World" for its immersive S.T.A.L.K.E.R.-like experience. We believe that no one mod list should have to compromise on one aspect while excelling in another, and "Fallout: Anomaly" aims to provide it all.
author: The FA Dev Team
